[Tt]emp/
[Oo]bj/
[Bb]uild/

.vscode/
*.csproj
*.unityproj
*.sln
*.suo
*.tmp
*.user
*.userprefs
*.pidb
*.booproj
*.svd
*.pdb
*.mdb

# Unity cache
*.apk
*.aab
*.unitypackage

# Crash reports
sysinfo.txt

# Rider
.idea/
*.sln.iml

# Mac
.DS_Store

# Windows
Thumbs.db
Desktop.ini

# Hidden meta
*.swp
*.bak
*.orig
*.tmp

# Git
.gitignore
.gitattributes
